title: Rebuild of Naruto
overview: The Rebuild of Naruto project is a complete re-edit of the entire Naruto anime with the benefit of hindsight of the complete story. The goal is to provide the definitive viewing experience of Naruto -- for both old and new viewers. Each arc is presented as a film/series of films. Meaning, episodes are seamlessly stitched together to create a naturally flowing story arc. In addition to that, all unnecessary filler, fluff, and padding are cut.
